price: Tungeli taka tungeli yafanya yakawa mapepe, mkabaki mnastaajabu,
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ
footnotes: Tungeli taka tungeli ifanya mimea hiyo iwe mabua na mapepe yaliyo katika katika kabla haijapevuka, mkawa mkistaajabu tu kwa uovu ulio isibu,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
